title: EdithDialog
body:
You there! Stop!
Did Alan send you? Nevermind that, you're here.
I'm hiding from my Sister-in-law.
[[Your Sister-in-law? |EdithResponse1]] [[Why? Are you okay? |EdithResponse1]]

title: EdithResponse1
body:
I'm afraid I've been taken for a fool...
My husband, Sir Thomas, brought me here to live with him and his sister, Lucille.
I left everything I had behind.
And now that I'm here, I've seen less of Thomas than ever. And Lucille...
I think she's poisoning my tea. 
My friend Dr. Alan was sending me a letter, I think with information about Thomas and Lucille in it, but Lucille got it first and tore it up. 
These are the only scraps I have. 
Could you help me try to put it together?
[[Yes of course! |EdithYes]] [[The last thing I want is to be poisoned, you're on your own! |EdithNo]]

title: EdithYes
body:
Thanks! 
I've got the Letter here in my pocket!
[[Brilliant, let's get started! |EdithDialogEnd]] [[Bring it out, we should hurry! |EdithDialogEnd]]

title: EdithNo
body:
Then I suggest you get out while you still can!
At least I've got Thomas... I think.
[[Good Luck |EdithDialogEnd]] [[Are you sure about that? |EdithDialogEnd]]

title: Letter1
body:
Here's the first page!
"Sir Thomas and Lucilleâ€™s Mother. . ."
[[was murdered in their home. |Letter1True]] [[died in a house fire. |Letter1False]]

title: Letter1True
body:
Thomas and Lucille's mother was murdered...
Such a violent death, and in their own home too.
With only Thomas and Lucille there. 
The next letter, we must continue to the next letter.
"Sir Thomas . . ." One word, only one word survived? Oh this is impossible.
[[has previous marriages, and is currently married |Letter2True]] [[Thomas a fugitive of the law |Letter2False]]

title: Letter1False
body:
Those poor kids, loosing their mother in a fire like that.
I understand all too well what it is like to loose a mother.
The next letter, we must continue to the next letter.
"Sir Thomas . . ." One word, only one word survived? Oh this is impossible.
[[has previous marriages, and is currently married |Letter2True]] [[Thomas a fugitive of the law |Letter2False]]

title: Letter2True
body:
No, not my Thomas. 
I asked him about Italy, about Milan. Did he lie?
The third letter, this is the last letter. One more, please.
"Lucille and Sir Thomas..." Oh this is hopeless.
[[Are in an incestuous relationship, and trying to steal her fortune. |Letter3True]] [[Are crazed twins escaped from an asylum. |Letter3False]]

title: Letter2False
body:
Thomas a fugitive! I married a criminal!
There must be a reason, Thomas would never have done anything... terrible, not without a reason.
The last letter, we must finish the last letter.
"Lucille and Sir Thomas..." Oh this is hopeless.
[[Are in an incestuous relationship, and trying to steal her fortune. |Letter3True]] [[Are crazed twins escaped from an asylum. |Letter3False]]

title: Letter3True
body:
Oh my...
Oh, oh my, what have I gotten myself into.
[[Edith, are you ok? |EdithLettersEnd]] [[Do you want to leave? |EdithLettersEnd]]

title: Letter3False
body:
Oh my...
Oh, oh my, what have I gotten myself into.
[[Edith, are you ok? |EdithLettersEnd]] [[Do you want to leave? |EdithLettersEnd]]

title: EdithEscape
body:
I can't stay, I mustn't; it isn't safe!
Thank you, friend, for helping me put this all together.
Now go. Go! You must leave this place!
[[Not without you! |EndCrimsonPeak]] [[Are you going to leave? |EndCrimsonPeak]]

title: EndCrimsonPeak
body:
I'll be right behind you!
Go, flee! And thank you again!
[[Good-bye! |EndCrimsonPeakSuccess]] [[Who's that down the hall? |EndCrimsonPeakSuccess]]

title: EdithTrapped
body:
No, this can't be right. 
I can't accept this! 
Thank you, for trying. But I will solve this myself.
[[Good Luck |EndCrimsonPeakFail]] [[Be Careful |EndCrimsonPeakFail]]
